code: import React from'react';import"./Menu.css";import{menu_list}from'../../assets/assets';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Menu=_ref=>{let{category,setCategory}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"explore-menu",id:"explore-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Explore our Menu"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"explore-menu-text",children:["Good food is the foundation of happiness,Eat well, live well, be well.Food is like art;",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"you can create anything with the right ingredients."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"explore-menu-list",children:menu_list.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:()=>setCategory(prev=>prev===item.menu_name?'All':item.menu_name),className:"explore-menu-listitem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:category===item.menu_name?"active":"",src:item.menu_image,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.menu_name})]},index);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{})]});};export default Menu;
